summary: Just a small tweak to increase vanity camera max distance
descriptionHtml:
Small tweak to increase vanity camera max distance.

[u]Installation:[/u]

1. Open file [b]C:\\Users\\USERNAME\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Skyrim.ini[/b]

2. Append these lines (if there is no [Camera] section) or change existing values to match them:
[Camera]
fVanityModeMaxDist=6000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=155.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=23826][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_animated.gif[/img]
Category: 110 - UI - Map[/url][/center]

[b]My new mod[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12338]Drem Fah Pah Nahl[/url]
author: Mikanoshi
